title: Introduction to C Programming
description: Learn the fundamentals of C programming, including syntax, data types, and control structures.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
description: Discover algorithm design and analysis techniques, focusing on sorting, searching, and optimization.

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
description: Explore C++ programming with a focus on data structures and algorithms (DSA) implementation.

title: Basic Data Structures
description: Understand fundamental data structures, including arrays, linked lists, stacks, and queues.

title: Introduction to OOP Python
description: Learn the principles of Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) using Python programming language.

title: Software Engineering
description: Gain insights into software development processes, methodologies, and best practices.

title: AWS, Cloud Computing
description: Understand the fundamentals of cloud computing and learn to use Amazon Web Services (AWS).

title: Database (MySQL)
description: Learn how to manage and query databases using MySQL, including database design and normalization.

title: Problem-Solving Part
description: Enhance your problem-solving skills and techniques for tackling programming challenges effectively.
